title: Friend's Game timer
body:
I am just wondering if this this issue is on my end? Or are others experiencing this as well? Is there a fix for this? Rito i love you guys and i love league any help would be great. I am not sure if my client is broken or not.

https://gyazo.com/17a72cd78dba7e0d2d638fceb12583f6
https://gyazo.com/ac5b16c18ad3db87bda46433b55e231b

replies.body:
https://gyazo.com/6acf79a631890513d9b3dd38f6db4a53
https://gyazo.com/f4be9b63e88ed5640bff7eda5697c681

For some reason my client adds 60min to their timer, so they been only in the game for 10 or so min but it shows up as 70min+

Oh wow, yea I'm betting they haven't actually been in a match for 70 minutes XD!

This looks like it might be a weird issue where the PC system clock isn't synced up correctly with real time. Check out this section on how to [**Sync Your Windows Clock**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues#wq3) to see how you can do it manually.

Let me know how that works!
Worked :) ty rito <3 keep up the good work!!

Actually i have 1 more issue. I have this guy on my list and his time is ALWAYS wrong i guess. Everyone else's got fixed but his. 
https://gyazo.com/5bd9663e339384ec4e4814ab0ed092dc
Well that's.....weird to say the least. Honestly, my best guess is that maybe your friend passed out while he was in a custom game o_O?
I think its from his end. Not mine i asked him about it and he said something is weird with his client but i assure u he isnt in there for that long.
